item.title: Words and sentences: parts of the body
item.summary: |xam names are given for parts of the body.
item.comments: 1) p. 197v: notes and additional comments by |a!kunta, 2) Note on the inside of the back cover of this notebook: 'Finished correcting Sept 15/71 from Jantje Toorm himself', 3) This story is found in Book II-1
item.author: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
